description.brief: Sampling based planner for a single leg on board a wheel-on-leg rover. Currently, the planner is tailored towards the DFKI Sherpa_TT rover.

package.description: Sampling based planner for a single leg on board a wheel-on-leg rover. Currently, the planner is tailored towards the DFKI Sherpa_TT rover
